entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to initial review
  • Assignee set to Greg Newby

Thanks for this submission. Based on the extent of changes, I believe it is most appropriate to proceed with a new GFD # that will obsolete the older one. I will bring this to the Standards Council for confirmation of this, and to proceed with the next steps towards public comment and eventual publication. It's great to see that this has been adopted by industry, and that real-world experiences have helped to inform the changes. Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
Dear authors/editors: apologies for the delay with this. I am re-raising my suggestion with the standards council.
    - Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Status changed from initial review to AD review
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Wolfgang Ziegler

Per the Standards Council telecon December 8, we will proceed with a new GFD #, obsoleting the older versions. The AD will check that these submissions are ready for public comment.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
I checked the document and it is almost ready for the public phase.

    Things to do:
    - The document needs a new GFD number that should be sent to the authors to replace the current 198
    - The authors should update the date of the copyright statements on page 1 and 18
    - The should an "Obsoletes" paragraph: This document obsoletes GFD-R-P.198 (and probably add a reference to
    GFD-R-P.198

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Wolfgang Ziegler to Greg Newby

Can you please send me the new GFD number for this document

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Status changed from AD review to author action

Same situation as #295: The doc # should be marked as "TBD" or similar, for now. This has not yet gone to public comment, so usually we wait until the document is closer to final publication to assign a new number.

The other changes mentioned in the tracker are similarly minor. This should be ready for public comment, as soon as any immediately forthcoming changes are made. Let me know, and we will put it in a public comment tracker, and announce
it.

Thanks,
Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• File drmaa-c.pdf added

As requested, here is an updated version of the document that can go into the public comment phase.

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to initial review
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

publish for public comments, please

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content: The public comment tracker is now available at https://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/35

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Status changed from initial review to public comment

Andre, please extend the public comment date to August 31. I will then announce.

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to AD review
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Wolfgang Ziegler

Public comment is complete, and no comments were received. We will seek input on next steps from the standards council and area director.

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content: Prior to publication, Wolfgang will check with the group in case there are other errata that should be considered. This is due to the long delay between submission and publication.

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Wolfgang Ziegler to Greg Newby

The group considers the documents ready for publication, no further changes needed.

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content: • Status changed from AD review to to be published

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Status changed from to be published to author action

Peter, others: Please generate the final version as PDF, with the GFD #230. Once that is uploaded, along with the document source (.tgz or similar), I will put this in the published documents area at www.ogf.org and announce publicly. Thanks... Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• File drmaa-c.pdf added

Please find the final document attached, as requested.

entry.title: Editor - document #296: DRMAA2 - GFD-R-P.198 - Errata 1
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to published

Published! Apologies for the delay. I left the date as November 21 at ogf.org, since these languished before I uploaded and announced them. Thanks to authors/editors for your work on these important updates to the DRMAA series.
